bibl.title: The Mystery of Timikleos Solved.

Adam Łajtar, Grzegorz Ochała & Jacques van der Vliet (edd.), Nubian Voices II. New Texts and Studies on Christian Nubian Culture = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XXVII (Warsaw, 2015) pp. 231-243.
